brandingAccessDeniedModalTitle: If you want to use the branding settings feature, please contact
signinInfo: By updating the settings you will change the appearance of the customer facing Web Portal
signInHeadingInfo: If left blank, headline will be “The Next Generation of After - Sales Services”
signInSubHeadingInfo: If left blank, subheading will be “A survival tool for machine manufacturers and distributors”
signInParagraphInfo: If left blank, the paragraph won’t be shown
brandLogoSubTitle: Please upload logo image that will be used on the log in page and on email notifications. Without uploading your logo, it will not be displayed.
colorSubTitle: Primary colour will be used as colour for the application main actions in customer’s app. The background of the application and the sidebar colour will be auto-generated according to the primary colour. Appearance of your email notifications and sing in screen will reflect the visual style, logo and branding you have selected.
invalidFileFormat: Your file format is not supported
fileSizeExceeds: Your file is larger than 500 KB. Please upload a smaller file
maxChar: You have reached the maximum {{}} character limit
